destinations.name: Luminara Tides
destinations.description: Immerse yourself in bioluminescent waters where marine life glows with ethereal light. This enchanting ocean world offers pristine beaches and cosmic-inspired tranquility beneath twin moons.

destinations.name: Crystalline Canyons
destinations.description: Venture through stunning crystal formations that catch and refract light into a thousand colors. Explore ancient geological formations and experience the majesty of crystalline landscapes.

destinations.name: Nebula Nexus Station
destinations.description: Experience luxury at the edge of known space. This orbital station offers unparalleled views of swirling nebula clouds and serves as the ultimate destination for cosmic adventurers.

destinations.name: Aurora Peak Paradise
destinations.description: Witness the mesmerizing dance of auroras above ice-capped peaks. A winter wonderland where the sky blazes with cosmic colors and pristine snow blankets the landscape.

destinations.name: Verdant Moon Sanctuary
destinations.description: Discover lush jungle valleys blessed with bioluminescent flora and pristine ecosystems. A haven for nature lovers and wildlife enthusiasts seeking connection with thriving alien biospheres.
